projects.title: heytor.com
projects.description: A personal portfolio website that reflects my personality and design style through interactive visualizations, thoughtful animations, and a cohesive design system. Built with Astro to showcase my work while learning modern web development and deployment.

content.heading: CONTEXT
content.content: I wanted to create a portfolio that reflects who I am: combining clean minimalism with playful, data science inspired elements that showcase both my technical skills and personality.

content.heading: DESIGN APPROACH
content.content: Every design decision was intentional. From the animated neural network on the About page to the interactive network graph on the Home page, I infused data science elements while maintaining a polished, professional aesthetic.

content.caption: Hero section with animated network graph

items.title: Interactive Visualizations
items.description: Custom animated network graphs and neural network visualizations using SVG and JavaScript

items.title: Cohesive Design System
items.description: Developed a custom design system with typography, color palette, and component architecture

items.title: Learning & Deployment
items.description: Dove deep into modern web development with Astro and TypeScript, learning the full deployment pipeline from development to production

content.heading: REFLECTION
content.content: Beyond technical skills, I learned how to translate my personality into code. The process of iterating on animations and balancing professionalism with playfulness taught me a lot about design thinking. Most importantly, I created something that lets me share a part of me with the world.
